experience.title: Product Designer
experience.description: - Led redesign efforts for LearnApp's website, focusing on enhancing user experience for Prime and All program pages.- Designed user flows and interfaces for Phase 1 of Varsity Live, aligning with Zerodha's Varsity’s design language.- Developed interactive practice formats including order placing, savings calculator, mcq image & Text.- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure the alignment of design with user needs.

positions.subtitle: Alchemy Technologies Ltd
positions.description: • Gathering and evaluating requirements in collaboration with the client and managers• Preparing and presenting rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders• Creating high-fidelity prototypes for design concepts• Optimizing existing user interface designs• Defining and creating visual guidelines for the product • Coordinating, supervising and doing the design QA for the final builds
positions.title: UI/UX Designer
positions.description_html:
• Gathering and evaluating requirements in collaboration with the client and managers
• Preparing and presenting rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders
• Creating high-fidelity prototypes for design concepts
• Optimizing existing user interface designs
• Defining and creating visual guidelines for the product
• Coordinating, supervising and doing the design QA for the final builds
